msItem.title: Trójumanna saga
msItem.rubric: Trojomanna Saga fyrst af Saturnus i Crit
msItem.incipit: A dogum Josua er hofdinge var a Jorsala lande yfir gidinga lyd eptir Moises
msItem.explicit: enn hier epter hefur søgu frä ænea og þeim er bretland bygdu

filiation.p: A copy of fols. 22r-33v in AM 544 4to (Hauksbók).

msItem.note: Note at the head of fol. 1r reads: ex membrana mea. Note on fol. 5v: vantar c. 9 línur í 544. Fol. 14r has a rubric which reads: Romverja frasaga.

msItem.title: Breta sögur
msItem.rubric: Hier hefur søgu Æneæ Breta sogur
msItem.incipit: Nu er ad seiga frä søgu Æneæ hinum millda
msItem.explicit: hann fostrade hakon son haralldz kongs härfagra
msItem.note: Saga text ends on fol. 29r and is followed by two 'parts' of Merlínusspá.

msItem.title: Merlínusspá
msItem.rubric: Af Merlino spämanne er var a døgum Vortigerni
msItem.incipit: Vortigernus kongur atlade ad lata
msItem.explicit: hann Merlinus spä og er næsta mikel

msItem.title: Merlínusspá
msItem.incipit: Radunst s: svabalz vidum
msItem.explicit: hafa hylie gudz og himenriki amen

msItem.title: Genealogy from Adam to Haralldr hárfagri
Ættartölur
msItem.rubric: Hier Byrjar Gømul Annal og Ættartølur
msItem.incipit: Þad er frodra manna søgn ad þad væri sidur i firndenne
msItem.explicit: en sydan lagde hann undir sig allann Noreg.

msItem.title: Landnámabók (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: Ulfur hinn skialge nam Rejkjanes
msItem.explicit: og Jllugi þad er Rejknesingia kin
msItem.note: Prior to the rubric on fol. 32v is a note: Haukur Erlendsson seigur hafa skrifad þessa landnams bök. Dætur þeira Hrafs Sveinbjarnar sonar og Hallkøtlu Einars dottir voru þær Steinuns mödir herra Hrafs og Herdys modir Ala, fødir Steinunar qvinnu Haukz.

msItem.title: Report of Greenland by Priest Halldór for Priest Arnaldur
Skrif Halldórs prests af Grænlandi til Arnalds prests
msItem.incipit: Þesse tydende ritude Halldor prestur af Grænalande
msItem.explicit: Sydan föru þeir heim aptur i Garda.

msItem.title: Eiríks saga rauða
Þorfinns saga karlsefnis
msItem.rubric: Hier hefur Søgu Þorfins Kallsefnes Þordarsonar
msItem.incipit: Olafur het herkongur er kalladur var Ölafur hvite
msItem.explicit: Þad er ecke er hier skräd

msItem.title: Fóstbræðra saga (Extracts)
msItem.rubric: Annall ur Søgu Þörmödar Kolbrünar Skallds, hvørsu til er hättad i Eirekzfirde og Einarsfirde
msItem.incipit: Skufur og Bjarne ättu bä ad Stocka nese
msItem.explicit: þar sat Liötur ad fiske a skipe vid 4 mann

msItem.title: Greenland's Bishops in Igaliku
msItem.incipit: Eirekur Arnalldur Jön
msItem.explicit: Olafur Þordur Arne

msItem.title: Hard Winters in Iceland
msItem.incipit: Oalldur vetur hinn mikle var a Jslande þegar i hejdne
msItem.explicit: ef ej bære a Drottens dag

msItem.title: Bishoprics in Norway, the Orkneys and the Faroes
msItem.incipit: J Færeyum er biskups stöll a Kyrkjúbæ
msItem.explicit: Stafangur Oslo og hier til færeya biskup og Orkeneyia
msItem.note: Rubric on fol. 43r:2.

msItem.title: Bishoprics in England
msItem.incipit: Ercke stoll i Cantara berge
msItem.explicit: j Vincestur i Laeceastro

msItem.title: Bishoprics in Scotland and Saxony
msItem.rubric: Þessir eru biskups stolar i Skotlande
msItem.incipit: Ad Andreas stofu, j Glerjskogum
msItem.explicit: i Strasborg og Megingu

msItem.title: Distances to Rome
msItem.incipit: Ad Libiku til Mylnu iiij mylur
msItem.explicit: iiij mylur til S. Päls kyrkiu

msItem.title: Parts of Norway
msItem.incipit: øll finnmorke, Halogalands
msItem.explicit: med øllumm skøttum og skylldum

msItem.title: Districts (fylki) in Norway
msItem.incipit: Aleigia fylke, Naumdæla
msItem.explicit: Rannryke, Gudbrands dalir

msItem.title: Distances of the Icelandic coast
msItem.incipit: Fra Horne er talenn dægur sigling til Hjorleyfs høfda
msItem.explicit: ad sigla fyrir hvørt nes.

msItem.title: Annals
msItem.incipit: Beda prestur andadur meir enn c arum
msItem.explicit: Enn hann rjkte alltz xxiij är

msItem.title: Kristni saga (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: Þä andadur Pascalus pape Kjrjelax Grickja kongur
msItem.explicit: enn annad i christne anno M cxviij ar

msItem.title: Landnámabók (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: J attdar fars bök Beda prests Anno mcxiij er geted þess lands er Thile hiet
msItem.explicit: er og þess geted a bökum enskum ad þann tima var fared mille landa.

msItem.title: Landnámabók (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: So seigia vitrir menn ad ur Norege fra Stadi sie vij dægra sigling til Horns
msItem.explicit: enn dægur sigling er fra Kolbeinsey nordur til Grænlands obygda.

msItem.title: Landnámabók (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: Son Rolfs kongs ur berge Svasa jøtuns nordann af Døfre
msItem.explicit: og nämu Alptafiørd hinn sydra i Austfiørdum.

msItem.title: Course Eiríksstefna
msItem.incipit: Þennann gamlann Jslendskann Rejkning 96 vjkur undann Snæfells jøkle

msItem.title: A Short Description of King Arthur
msItem.rubric: Artus Breta Kongur andadur Anno domini D ära
msItem.incipit: xlij oflega a dogum Leonis Keysara
msItem.explicit: Enn Artus hafde hejman xl þusundrada og fotgaungu lid ad auke.
msItem.note: Rubric blends into first line of text.

msItem.title: How Noah's Sons Divided the World Amongst Themselves
msItem.rubric: Frä þvi hvar hvor Noha sona bygde hejmenn
msItem.incipit: Synir Noha voru iij
msItem.explicit: þa verda tungur allts lxxij, enn þiodlønd þusundrad

msItem.title: On Famous Rivers and Miraculous Springs
msItem.incipit: Brunnur er eirn i Paradysu er ur falla
msItem.explicit: eda üll edur sma tre þa verdur allt ad steine.

msItem.title: Prologus
msItem.incipit: Þad er sagt ad Moises tæke þad räd
msItem.explicit: þau tidende er ei skulu ur mynne lyda

msItem.title: On Paradise
msItem.incipit: Svo er sagdt ad Paradys er hinn hædste hutur þessarar veralldar
msItem.explicit: og verja biorg og hitar ad menn skule ej þangad komur

msItem.title: A Geographical Compendium
msItem.incipit: Þessarar bygdar þa er Jndialand fyrst
msItem.explicit: þar er Meilans borg a j henne var Ambrosius biskup.
msItem.note: Note in a light-coloured ink on fol. 48r reads: ex membr. mea, possibly referring to AM 544 4to?

msItem.title: On Foreign Towns and the Burial Places of Saints
msItem.incipit: Roma borg er yfir øllum borgum
msItem.explicit: enn Nicholaus biskup j Bär.

msItem.title: Adam's burial place
msItem.incipit: Seth sonur Adams jardade fødur sinn i dalnum Ebron
msItem.explicit: er skrifad ad Gidingar giørdu ur kross Drottens
msItem.note: Note on fol. 48r: excerptum ex membr. mea (AM 544 4to?).

msItem.title: A Treatise On The Four Elements And Their Mixture In Man's Blood
msItem.incipit: Madurenn hefur liking iiij høfud skepna
msItem.explicit: og fellur þvj slepia ur nøsum sem hornum.
msItem.note: A note on fol. 48v reads: Ex membr. mea (AM 544 4to?).

msItem.title: Hervarar saga og Heiðreks (Extracts)
Hervarar saga ok Heiðreks
msItem.rubric: Hier eru gätur Hejdrex kongs Høfundarsonar og Hervarar döttur Angantirs Arngeirssonar, er oden uppbar i rann rettir enn liest[?] vera Gestur Blinde hinn favise
msItem.incipit: Hafa jeg þad villda er eg hafda i giær
msItem.explicit: og a þeirre nött var kongur drepenn.
msItem.note: H redaction of the riddles from Hervarar saga og Heiðreks. Similar to those preserved in AM 281 4to and possibly copied from AM 544 4to prior to its current defective state.

msItem.title: On Sacrifices
msItem.incipit: Risar giørdu støpul þann er Babel het
msItem.explicit: Ur Babilone mun fara høggormur sä er svelgia mun allann hejmenn

msItem.title: On the Trumpet
msItem.incipit: Hvad er hid efsta Mothorn?
msItem.explicit: i siälfre uppnumningu og endurlifnade

msItem.title: On Heathen Gods
msItem.incipit: So seiger oss helgar bækur ad eingi madur skal blota hejdnar vættir
msItem.explicit: hann var hinn elldste fadir þeirra guda.

msItem.title: Augustine's Explanation of Female Behaviour
Kenning Augustini
msItem.incipit: So seiger S. Augustinus til lære svejna sinna
msItem.explicit: og til þess ad þau skule þa betur halldir

msItem.title: Excerpts
msItem.note: Taken from Landnámabók, Kristni saga, Íslendingabók and other, unidentified sources.

msItem.title: Settlement in the Eastfjörds
msItem.incipit: Þä er ulflíotur var ad aldri lx
msItem.explicit: er þingfarar kaupe attu ad gegna.

msItem.title: Kristni saga Extracts
msItem.incipit: Jtem hann baud Þangbrand
msItem.explicit: þä var lided fra holldgan vors herra Jesu Christi mcviij är.

msItem.title: Placenames of Iceland's Westfjords
msItem.incipit: Olafur kongur Trigvason bardur a Ormenum langa
msItem.explicit: Ønundar fjordur Suganda fjordur

msItem.title: Landnámabók (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: Þurjdur sandur fillir seiddi til þess i hallæri a haloga lande
msItem.explicit: af hvorjum bonda i Jsafirde.
msItem.note: Following the explicit is a line: Gunnbjarnar sker liggia utnordur i haf. Unclear whether this belongs to this item, the next or neither.

msItem.title: Placenames in Southern and Eastern Iceland
msItem.incipit: Länganes, Finna fjordur
msItem.explicit: Reikia nes Alftanes.
msItem.note: A later hand has added: Seltiarnarnes, kialarnes, Akranes.

msItem.title: De Dialectica
msItem.incipit: Anno de mil y qvinientos y cincuenta y siete
msItem.explicit: tiene feedello el secretario delas vniversidad
msItem.note: On an inserted half-leaf.

msItem.title: Warrant of Titulus
msItem.incipit: Don Philippe por la gratia de dios Rey de Castilion illa de Licon
msItem.explicit: la fire estrivio porsu mandado con acuerdu del del su conscio.
msItem.note: On an inserted half-leaf.

msItem.author: Ovid
Horace
msItem.title: Two Quotes from Horace and Ovid
msItem.incipit: Hor: Rebus angustis animosus atque
msItem.explicit: Medio tutissimus ibis.
msItem.note: On an inserted half-leaf.

msItem.title: Copies of Previous Texts with Notes
msItem.note: A set of additional copies of texts found elsewhere in the manuscript accompanied by notes in AM's hand. A note on fol. 55r reads: communicatum á Thordo Jonæa.

msItem.title: Augustine's Explanation of Female Behaviour
Kenning Augustini
msItem.rubric: So seiger S. Augustinus j sinne kiuningu til læresveina sinna og presta
msItem.incipit: Sumar konur eru so witlausar
msItem.explicit: betur halldast og wel hafast.
msItem.note: Note above rubric: Ex libro chart. (AM 281 4to?). Marginal note in the hand of AM: hæc habeo in codice membraneo, qvi primo loco continet fragmentum libri originum Island.

msItem.title: Bishoprics in Norway
msItem.incipit: J färeyum er biskups stooll ä Kirkiubæ
msItem.explicit: og j Hamar Kaupangi.

msItem.title: Bishoprics in England
msItem.incipit: Erkistool j Cantarabrigi
msItem.explicit: j Wincestur, j Lanceastro.

msItem.title: Bishoprics in Scotland
msItem.incipit: Ad Andreas stofu, j glerskögum
msItem.explicit: j sudureyum, og bareyumm.

msItem.title: Bishoprics in Saxony
msItem.incipit: J Brumum, og j spiru
msItem.explicit: j Strasborg, og Meginsu

msItem.title: Distances to Rome
msItem.incipit: Af lybichu til Mylnu 4 mylur
msItem.explicit: og latrum iiij M. til Ste. Päls kirkiu iiij
msItem.note: Fol. 56 contains notes by AM on these texts, mostly relating to the MS source, which he received from Jon Þordarson á Bakka í Melasveit in 1707.

msItem.title: Districts (fylki) in Norway
msItem.incipit: Häleiga filke Naumdæla filke
msItem.explicit: Ryngaryke, Gudbrandsdaler. (27.)

msItem.title: Distances of the Icelandic Coast
msItem.incipit: Fra horne er taled dægur sigling til hiörleifs hófda
msItem.explicit: ad sigla firer hvert nes.

msItem.title: How Noah's Sons Divided the World Amongst Themselves
msItem.rubric: Fra þvi hvar hvor Noä sona bygde heiminn
msItem.incipit: Magon ried Svyþiood hinnj miklu
msItem.explicit: vind land er vestast næst danmórg

msItem.title: Copies of Previous Texts
msItem.note: A third copy of a selection of texts in another hand.

msItem.title: Augustine's Explanation of Female Behaviour
Kenning Augustini
msItem.rubric: So seiger S. Augustinus i sinne kinningu til lærisveina sinna og presta
msItem.incipit: Sumar konur eru so witlausar
msItem.explicit: betur halldast og wel hafast.
msItem.note: Note above rubric: Ex libro chart. (AM 281 4to?).

msItem.title: Bishoprics in Norway
msItem.incipit: J færeyum er biskups stóll ä Kirkiubæ
msItem.explicit: og i hamar kaupangi.

msItem.title: Bishoprics in England
msItem.incipit: Erkistol i Cantarabrigi
msItem.explicit: i Wincestur, i larceastro.

msItem.title: Bishoprics in Scotland
msItem.incipit: Ad Andreas stofu, i Glerskögum
msItem.explicit: i sudureyum, og Bäreyumm.

msItem.title: Bishoprics in Saxony
msItem.incipit: J Brimum, og i Spiru
msItem.explicit: i Strasborg og Meginsu

msItem.title: Distances to Rome
msItem.incipit: Af lybichu til Mylnu 4 mylur
msItem.explicit: og latran iiij m. til Ste. Päls kirkiu iiij.

msItem.title: Districts (fylki) in Norway
msItem.incipit: Haleigia filke Naumdæla filke
msItem.explicit: Ryngaryke, Güdbrandsdaler (27)

msItem.title: Distances of the Icelandic Coast
msItem.incipit: Fra horne er talid dægur sigling til hiórleifshófda
msItem.explicit: ad sigla firir hvert nes.

msItem.title: How Noah's Sons Divided the World Amongst Themselves
msItem.rubric: Fra þvi hvar hvór Nöasona bygde heiminn
msItem.incipit: Magon ried Svyþiöd hinne miklu
msItem.explicit: vindland er vestast næst Danmorch

msItem.title: Partial Table of Contents for AM 281 4to
msItem.rubric: Hæc est senes tractatum j Bök Sigurdar BjörnSons
msItem.incipit: Af Merlino spamanne
msItem.explicit: Volvo Spaa
msItem.note: A list of the contents of AM 281 4to with no mention of Völsunga saga, Ragnars saga or Trójumanna saga and with some variation in spelling between here and the other MS. Laid out in two columns. Note in pencil at the foot of fol. 59r in the hand of K. Kålund: udtaget af AM 597b 4to.

msItem.author: Páll Vídalín
msItem.title: Letter from Páll Vídalín to a certain Guðmundur
msItem.incipit: Ydur sie witanlegt ad jeg hefe
msItem.explicit: mitt nafn ad Videbalstungu
msItem.colophon: Þann 5. Novembris Anno 1712. Paall Jonsson Widalin
msItem.note: Entire text is crossed-out.

msItem.title: Árni Magnússon's Notes
msItem.incipit: Ragnars Saga þesse confererest vid hónd Sigurdar Jonssonar ä Knór
msItem.explicit: ad sia heriem Tractatuum.
msItem.note: AM's notes on Ragnars saga and Trójumanna saga, assumed to refer to the present MS, but may be in reference to AM 281 4to. Note in pencil at the foot of fol. 59r in the hand of K. Kålund: udtaget af AM 597b 4to

supportDesc.support:
Flyleaves contemporary to binding.
Fols. 53 and 54 are half-leaves. Beehive watermark on front flyleaf.

foliation.p: Foliated in pencil in upper corners beside older, faded red foliation.

condition.p: Some damage to the inner margin of fol. 52v has been restored with lost text supplied in a later hand.

decoDesc.decoNote: Faces drawn into the rubric on fol. 1r.

additions.p: Extensive marginalia and notes (see above). Slip in the hand of AM reads: Fra Sera Þorde ä Stadarstad. Small slip added between fols. 42 and 43 containing a list of bishoprics in Norway. Small slip added between fols. 43 and 44 with the title Nofn stundanna (cf. AM 281 4to). Fols. 52-60 may be later additions.

binding.p: Bound in nineteenth-century(?) plain pasteboards. Blue shelfmark label and another label numbered 511 affixed to spine.

provenance.p: According to AM's note on fol. 60, this MS once also held Ragnars Saga. It also states that Árni Magnússon acquired this manuscript before AM 281 4to (bók Sigurðar Björnssonar lögmanns). Fols. 55-58 might indicate that AM had originally received fol. 58 as a sample of the contents of AM 597 b 4to, whose owner he did not initially know.

revisionDesc.change: Created as subset of full file on handrit.is.
Introduced repository auth file. Updated repository element pointing, adding @ref and removing @key.
Extracted pagination and page dimension data from previous version.
Added template elements and details from handrit catalog description.
